newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates - Quotes lightly mixed.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates - Quotes lightly mixed.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were quoted at thinly mixed levels on St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session.
Ten barges traded versus none on Wednesday.
- Five barges, Mid-Mississippi River, one each week of August, traded at 115 percent of tariff.
- Five barges, Mid-Mississippi, one each week of August, traded at 115 percent.
- Eight barges, upper Mississippi (St Paul-Savage), two each week of June, bid 135 percent - unchanged from Wednesday, similar, offer 145 percent, up five percentage points from Wednesday.
- Eight barges, mid-Mississippi, two each week of October, bid 210 percent, down 7-1/2 percentage points from Wednesday, similar, no offer.
- Four barges, Ohio River, one each week of October, bid 205 percent, no comparison, no offer.
